meanings.definition: The quality or state of being kingly.
meanings.sent1: His kinglinesses shone through in his noble actions.
meanings.sent2: The castle was filled with the kinglinesses of its ruler.
meanings.sent3: The cat tried to mimic the kinglinesses of the lion by walking with a regal air.
meanings.sent4: The mountain peak exuded a sense of kinglinesses, towering over the landscape.
meanings.sent5: The golden crown symbolized the kinglinesses of the monarch.

meanings.definition: The characteristics or attributes of a king.
meanings.sent1: The kinglinesses of the ruler were evident in his majestic attire.
meanings.sent2: The kingdom admired the kinglinesses of their benevolent leader.
meanings.sent3: The child pretended to possess the kinglinesses of a monarch while playing dress-up.
meanings.sent4: The old oak tree stood with the kinglinesses of a wise king, its branches like a royal cloak.
meanings.sent5: The painting captured the essence of royal kinglinesses in every brushstroke.
